description: Evaluate Data Agent's semantic understanding capabilities: BigBetter direction, Ranking Items identification, Indicator Column detection, and Indicator Values extraction.

bigbetter.description: Preference direction inference (1=higher is better, 0=lower is better)

ranking_items.description: Identification of numeric columns representing entities to be ranked

indicator_col.description: Detection of categorical column for stratified analysis

indicator_values.description: Extraction of unique values from indicator column

bigbetter_high.description: Datasets where higher values indicate better performance

bigbetter_low.description: Datasets where lower values indicate better performance

bigbetter_ambiguous.description: Datasets with ambiguous column names (no clear semantic hint)

indicator_clear.description: Datasets with clear indicator column for stratification

items_complex.description: Datasets with metadata columns that should be excluded from ranking items
